DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intrauterine hCG improve implantation rate clinical pregnancy rate embryo transfer IVF/ICSI cycle .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Intrauterine Infusion hCG Time Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients infertility clinic , siriraj hospital come start IVF/ICSI treatment cycle endometrial preparation embryo transfer consiferes eligible subject . On day embryo transfer ( fresh frozen-thaw cycle ) , subject randomize 2 group . 1. control group : embryo transfer intrauterine infusion standard embryo culture medium 4-7 minute 2. study group : embryo transfer intrauterine infusion hCG ( Pregnyl ) 4-7 minute The patient come back serum beta-hCG measurement 2 week later embryo transfer 2 week later transvaginal ultrasound beta-hCG positive .
DOC.criteria: 1. infertile woman age 1843 year 2. indicate willing IVF/ICSI treatment endometrial preparation embryo transfer 1 . Azoospermic male partner 2 . Failure retrieve oocyte control ovarian hyperstimulation 3 . No embryo retrieve transfer 4 . Endometrial preparation failure
